Welcome to the Kayman

This is a personal website designed as a virtual scrapbook. It provides blogging opportunities and focuses on five categories or areas of interest:

  • The Dreamer
  • The Maverick
  • The Poet
  • The Disciple
  • The Technophile

This site is built with jekyll and bootstrap following the recipe outlined in Marcelo Canina's tutorial "How to Add Bootstrap to Jekyll the Right Way". Contrary, to his suggestions the bootstrap components are included. It utilizes Github's gh-pages service to host the site.
